p: Powdered samples of different A. sinensis organs (200.0 g) were added into a round-bottom flask with distilled water (1800 mL), and subjected to water distillation for 6 h using an electric heater (450 W). The essential oil was extracted with diethyl ether, dried with anhydrous sodium sulfate, and stored under cryopreservation conditions at −20 °C for further analysis.
